during a Thursday conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google's co-founders as his "best friends." "I believe Larry is ready" to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. Eric Schmidt also may have been growing weary of all the scrutiny that comes with running one of world's most scrutinized companies. For the first time last year, he started to sit out Google

"not a reaction to competitors". Rather, he said, it was an effort to speed up decision making at the company, which ended the year with about 24 000 employees. Google has many different businesses and the issue that we have been getting into is there's too many ways[ in] which these businesses can be slowed down, Eric Schmidt said. Eric Schmidt , who became CEO in 2001 to bring more management experience to a then-fledgling company, will assume the role of executive chairman, focusing on deals and government outreach, among other things

US X Factor. The Price Of Beauty star took to her Twitter account this week to dismiss a recent rumour that she could join Simon Cowell on the judging panel of his upcoming Fox competition. Just to clear up a rumour... I am NOT going to judge X Factor!!! I don't even know where that info came from, ( sic ) she wrote. Jessica Simpson is the latest in a string of celebrities to be linked to the show. Other names that have been mentioned as possible judges include Mariah Carey , Nicole Scherzinger and UK X Factor judge Cheryl Cole
